content:
Prev: Soldier base Up: Museu d'Art Contemporani Next: Through the window

Orrery



This piece was a glass plate on which these numbered disks and connections between them appeared.
I like the interplay between the piece itself and the shadows behind it.
Taken Saturday, September 15, 2001, 07:07:59pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 448kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/20s @ F2.8, ISO 200, 38mm
PS6 Curves 0:0 - 95:60 - 175:205 - 255:255, R 0:0 - 255:245, Crop, USM 20:100 - 30:4 - 100:0.5
